ref: 9872 marāla1 m. ʻ a kind of duck or goose or flamingo ʼ Kāv., ˚aka -- m. lex. [The variant marula -- m. ʻ a kind of duck ʼ lex. scarcely justifies connecting marāla -- (EWA ii 588) with Lat. merula ʻ blackbird ʼ (IE. base *ames<-> IEW 35)]
Pk. marāla -- m. ʻ a kind of goose ʼ;
H. marāl m. ʻ a goose with red legs and bill ʼ,
